name: @muratgozel/directus-operation-slugify
description: Generates a language aware slug from texts.
author: Murat GÃ¶zel <murat@gozel.com.tr>

scripts.up: export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs -0) && npm run build && aws s3 sync ./ s3://$S3_BUCKET_NAME/extensions/directus-extension-operation-slugify/ --exclude '*' --include 'package.json' --include 'dist/*' --delete
scripts.up-dev: export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs -0) && npm run build && rsync -a --exclude='src' --exclude='node_modules' --include='package.json' --include='dist' --include='dist/*' --exclude='*' --delete ./* $EXTENSIONS_DIR/directus-extension-operation-slugify/
